                  java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

        pass - the password for signing in.
        responseHandler - the callback to handle response.

      • postImg

        public void postImg(java.io.File f,
           java.lang.String contentType,
           com.loopj.android.http.AsyncHttpResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Posts the image file to the server. USE ONLY WITH SUBUSER ACCOUNT. The project id's are linked to the subuser account.
        Parameters:
        f - the file to be posted.
        contentType - the content type of the image.
        responseHandler - the callback to handle response.

        contentType - the content type of the image.
        id - the project id for the image.
        responseHandler - the callback to handle response.
